about_the_game:
Try it out! Get a feel of the Zen you can get with a pen, and see if the full experience could be something for you. The demo includes one out of nine levels where you can experience both the easy and normal difficulty. It includes a number of different obstacles and game mechanics that are unique to Zen With A Pen. The full version of the game of course includes a lot more advanced levels and powers, but hey, you have to start somewhere!

Let's see if you have what it takes to get Zen With A Pen!
